description.value:
You cannot be forced to attack an ally under any circumstances. Such an attempt automatically fails, although damage or conditions associated with the effect that would cause you to attack your ally can still affect you. You can attack an ally if you choose to do so.

In addition, when you use healing word, the target of the power gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

You also gain the following powers.
